name: Xenoclast IV
flavor_text: "Nice chitin. It'd be a shame if someone broke it." —Liu Feng

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Ranged shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Greatly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifled Barrel

perks.description: Smooth shotgun barrel. Greatly increases range at the cost of more projectile spread.
perks.name: Smoothbore

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Balanced shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Barrel Shroud

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.
perks.name: Full Choke

perks.description:
This shotgun's magazine is optimized for quick combat.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases rate of fire
perks.name: Assault Mag

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.
perks.name: Lead from Gold

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.
perks.name: Slideways

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor

perks.description: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Underdog

perks.description: Reloads two shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.
perks.name: Dual Loader

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.
perks.name: Slideshot

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Hitting an enemy with every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for a short duration.
perks.name: One-Two Punch

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.
perks.name: Trench Barrel

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Surrounded

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break
